data: Bob Smith works as Chief Technology Officer at TechCorp in the enterprise software industry.
Bob Smith has 20 years of experience in technology leadership.
Bob Smith graduated from MIT with a degree in Computer Science.
Bob Smith's expertise includes cloud computing, cybersecurity, and large-scale systems.
Bob Smith scaled a technology platform to 1M users and published 10 papers.
Bob Smith is located in San Francisco, California, United States.
Bob Smith's research notes mention meeting at a conference and preferring Zoom calls.
